name: climresd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, c3)), wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, c3)), wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, c3)), wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), cli, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

comment: A function restricted to upper integers converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Apr-2023.)
